unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Probability: Making Those Free Throws! Part II
question_text: A professional basketball player has a $60$ % chance of making his first throw.  If he makes his first free throw, there is a $70$ % chance he makes his second free throw.  If he does not make his first throw, there is a $45$ % chance he makes his second free throw. What is the probability he makes at least one free throw?
